snippet.title: Fight Night Champion - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the sweet science of boxing unfold in the first look at Fight Night Champion. Get ready for the fight of your life in EA sports latest game.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com
